purpose: The email is a call for workshop proposals for the 23rd International Conference on Service-Oriented Computing (ICSOC 2025), which will take place from December 1-4, 2025, in Shenzhen, China. It invites applicants to submit high-quality workshop proposals that contribute to the scientific program of the conference. The workshops aim to provide a forum for focused discussions on specific sub-areas within Service-Oriented Computing and to foster community-building activities. The email outlines important submission dates and provides links for further information.

evidence_sentences: ICSOC is inviting applicants to submit proposals for high-quality workshops contributing to the scientific program of the main conference.

The workshop program seeks to provide venues for specialist groups to meet and hold a focused discussion on specific sub-areas within Service-Oriented Computing, and to engage in community-building activities.
Workshop proposals shall be submitted to Workshop Co-chairs, see https://icsoc2025.hit.edu.cn/19950/list.htm for the list of information to include in the proposal.
